title: Contemporary First Floor,D/W,Closets,Sh Lndry,Pkg Avail(166 Athol#108)
posting_body: * Parking available at an add'l monthly fee
First floor 1BR/1BA with shared laundry and parking option.
Apartment has a large living room with defined dining space across from the semi-open kitchen.
Kitchen includes electric range and dishwasher.
Building has shared laundry and there's optional parking for an additional monthly fee.
Building is on a quiet street less than a block from Athol Plaza and the lake.
Shopping and dining district on East 18th Street also less than a block away.
Bus lines 14, 18, 26, 40 and 840 all within two blocks.
Walk Score is 87, Transit Score is 70.
Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.
Leasing and Real Estate: Our Family Business for Over 100 Years.

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
